Module: trimmer

trims a video or audio file
Used by sam_transcriber/split.js module.

Author:
  • Pietro Passarelli
Source:
  • interactive_transcription_generator/transcriber/trimmer.js, line 1
Example
var trimmer = require('./index.js')
 trimmer.trim({
	src:"debate_test.wav", 
	input: 773,
	duration:20,
	outputName:"debate_test_trimmed.wav",
	callback: function(outputName, input){
		console.log("done! new file "+outputName+" starts at this point in original "+ input)
	}
})

Requires

  • module:ffmpeg-fluent

Methods

(inner) trim(config) → {callback}

Trims a video or audio file

Parameters:
Name Type Description
config object

The parameter containting attribute options.

Properties
Name Type Description
src string

video or audio file path,relative to computer root
input number

input point for cutting video or audio from
duration number

duration to cut video or audio for how long
outputName string

desired name of the trimmed clip
Source:
  • interactive_transcription_generator/transcriber/trimmer.js, line 22
Returns:

config.callback - Optional callback to return when transcription has done processing. It returns output name and input.

Type
callback
